name: quickbooks_query
description: This tool integrates with the QuickBooks REST API to facilitate advanced querying capabilities. Users can specify selections from a comprehensive list of QuickBooks resources such as accounts, transactions, and reports. The tool supports detailed query customization, allowing for precise data retrieval by selecting fields, specifying the resource, applying filters, and setting limits on the number of records returned. It is designed to provide developers and integrators with a powerful way to access and manipulate financial data directly from QuickBooks.

select.description: Specifies the fields to be retrieved from the selected QuickBooks resource. When using this parameter you must be very specific you should only get what you need and recall the tool to return additional fields.

from.description: Identifies the QuickBooks resource from which data will be queried. Options include various account details, transaction types, financial reports, and more.

where.description: Defines the filtering criteria to narrow down the results in the query.

maxlimit.description: Sets the maximum number of records to return in a single query. Default is set to 5 to ensure performance and manageability.
